entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Fort St. John

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 12:00 PM MST Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 80.5 km
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: W 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 25 March 2023
